{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["So something more than what was taught, eh?"]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["Well then, did you know that Parliament is actually older than what it is?"]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["This would be the time when Dora Markos founded Gianna."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["During the construction of the castle, there was strange issues between Dora and her team that was running the place."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["Apparently they spirited away from their homeland, for reasons that haven't been revealed..."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["But there have been rumors about their old homeland learning of some dark magic and was planning an invasion of the mainland..."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["By this time, Dora had an heir... \\|And her eyes red!"]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["Yep! Like I, she went to Demon's Spire and made a pact..."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["No! I wasn't gonna follow in Dora's footsteps. Sush, you!"]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["In any case, Dora had already created a council before all of this happened."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["But all in all, she was stripped of her title, position, and land... Officially."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["I was looking through some old edicts and documents for some arguments against the Parliment when I found it...!"]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["Apparently Dora had set this up to begin with! But she had something more important than I thought..."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["She had the Black Jewel... Till she went to Demon's Spire..."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["...... That's one of the reasons why I went there. Y-You already know the other reason."]}
{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["....Still, there is something doesn't makes sense."]}

{"code":401,"indent":1,"parameters":["\\!
This happened around the time of the Demonic Invasion..."]}
